issue.title: [Rust] Add min/max for [Large]String
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-9977](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-9977). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Strings are ordered and thus we can apply min/max as other types.

comments.body:
